      • MASSecureSharedStorage

        public MASSecureSharedStorage(java.lang.String accountName,
                              boolean activeSecureMode,
                              boolean sharedMode,
                              boolean storageMode)
        Creates or retrieves a MASSecureSharedStorage with the specified name. Ensure that this does not conflict with any existing accountName on the device.
        Parameters:
        accountName - the name of the account to be created in the AccountManager
